Date: Thursday, 2/2/1990
Subject: Fan Reaction
Hello Boss,
Our fans aren't really happy about the loss of Alfredo Griffin.
The overall fan interest decreases slightly.

Sincerly,
Your PR Director

Date: Monday, 5/1/1990
Subject: Status of Gerald Williams
Dear Sir,
Gerald Williams shouldn't play at AA Gwinnett Braves!
He has an AVG of .188 over there, that might
be a sign that he has been promoted to soon. You
should demote him before he gets burned.

Regards,
Scouting Director
